channel.title: DeadlyRosesX F2P [Unique][F2P][OPEN BETA][JOIN NOW!]
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]W[/SIZE][/FONT]elcome to this advertisement page.
[FONT=Arial Black]Storyline:[/FONT] I was Searching For A Unique Server And I couldnt Find one.... So i was thinking of a very good and unique server and i came up with a f2p based server with no member features at all... after some time of coding i am officially opening deadlyrosesx F2P! in beta!
Website:[URL=http://"http://deadlyrosesxf2p.enjin.com/"]Click here[/URL]
Media: [IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm292/adodwerg/lumbguide.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm292/adodwerg/members.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm292/adodwerg/monsterspawns.png[/img]
[QUOTE][URL=http://"http://www.****************/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/474720-317-deadlyrosesx-f2p-new-treath.html#post3883292"][IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm292/adodwerg/Banner.png[/img] [/URL][/QUOTE] I Know this isnt a good advertisement page.. But more to come in the feature!

item.title: DeadlyRosesX F2P [Unique][F2P][OPEN BETA][JOIN NOW!]
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“adodwerg2, post:9, topic:511202”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=629448.msg4270390#msg4270390 date=1364487500]
You should have prepared more pictures and information before posting an advertisement, by the looks of it now i don’t see anything good happening. That banner is horrible, i’d just scrap it and leave a blank space.
[/quote]as clearly stated… BETA how fking stupid are you loves at mopar >.>[/quote]
Your rudeness is disgusting, no player wants an inconsiderate owner. Beta doesn’t mean a lack of pictures or information, it means that you’re looking for players to find bugs and give feedback. Categorising Moparains isn’t going to help you, you’re only going to make enemies. I think you should apologies for this rude behaviour as you were incorrect, and out of line.

Read full topic

item.title: DeadlyRosesX F2P [Unique][F2P][OPEN BETA][JOIN NOW!]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

^ flaming get’s you no where. I’ll give you some tips:

  1. Get that support thing out.
  2. Post an UPDATE LOG
  3. Add unique features
  4. More pictures xD

Here’s a link to a good adv: FroznFury

item.title: DeadlyRosesX F2P [Unique][F2P][OPEN BETA][JOIN NOW!]
item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

[quote=“adodwerg2, post:3, topic:511202”]acctually i have been coding this for a couple of months now and i did not leech it… did you even read?

if you want to know what i did i can give u some details…

removed all p2p drops/ monsters and made new spawns for the npc’s( from scratch… )

placed shops at the right places where they should be like in official runescape… and even recoded the shops to the official runescape back in the day!

removed the p2p prayers

and alot more…

ALSO the websites in the pictures wont work since they will be a work in progress…[/quote]

so nothing btw Ajax!
